full_summary:
# Hill Granite Curb Reset and Repair Tender Announcement
**Official Tender Reference:** WS3444263420-Doc3910217037

## Tender Details
* **Tender Number:** WS3444263420
* **Tender Status:** *Cancelled*

## Tender Overview
The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) invites qualified contractors to submit proposals for the repair and replacement of damaged Granite curbs on a hillside. The successful bidder will be responsible for cutting asphalt along the affected area, removing damaged Granite curbs, and replacing them with new ones supplied by PSPC. The scope of work also includes the removal of an identified concrete pad, pouring of new concrete, and installing new asphalt.

## Tender Method
The Government of Canada will adopt a competitive and open bidding method, allowing qualified contractors to submit their proposals.

## Evaluation Criteria
Proposals will be evaluated based on the lowest price.

## Important Dates
* **Publication Date:** 9 March 2023
* **Tender Closing Date:** 19 April 2023, 14:00:00 (ET)
* **Expected Contract Start Date:** 30 April 2023
* **Expected Contract End Date:** 15 September 2023

## Trade Agreements
This tender is subject to the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA).

## Regions and Contact Information
The work will be carried out in Ottawa, Canada. 

## Additional Information
For more information, please visit the following link: [http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/15650223?extsite=MTU2NTAyMjNfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==](http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/15650223?extsite=MTU2NTAyMjNfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==)
